book_stories:
book_data = {
    "title": "Jay's Robo-Adventure with Nailer",
    "pages": {
        "page_01": "Once upon a sunny day in a small town, there lived a 4-year-old boy named Jay with his best friend, Nailer the robot.",
        "page_02": "Jay and Nailer did everything together. They would build tall towers with blocks, paint colorful pictures, and race around the backyard.",
        "page_03": "One morning, while playing, Jay discovered that Nailer's shiny buttons were not lighting up. ‘Oh no, Nailer, what's wrong?’ he asked.",
        "page_04": "‘Jay, I need your help!’ beeped Nailer. ‘My battery is low and I need to recharge. But, the charging cable is missing!’",
        "page_05": "Jay looked in the toy box, under the bed, and even in the cookie jar, but the charging cable was nowhere to be found.",
        "page_06": "Feeling a bit sad, Jay sat next to Nailer and thought hard. Then suddenly, he had an idea! ‘Let's retrace our steps!’ he cheered.",
        "page_07": "Jay and Nailer started their quest. They visited the places where they had played the day before. First stop, the sandbox in the park!",
        "page_08": "But the charging cable was not in the sandbox. Instead, they found their lost ball and some shiny pebbles, which they collected in Jay's pocket.",
        "page_09": "Next, they went to the library where they had read books about stars and rockets. They quietly searched among the aisles.",
        "page_10": "‘Beep-Boop! Look, Jay!’ whispered Nailer, pointing with his metallic finger. There, behind a pile of storybooks, was the missing charging cable!",
        "page_11": "Jay and Nailer hugged and rushed home. They plugged Nailer into the charger, and his buttons started lighting up again, one by one.",
        "page_12": "Nailer was back to his beeping, happy self, and Jay was over the moon. Together, they celebrated with a dance in the living room."
    },
    "summary": "In 'Jay's Robo-Adventure with Nailer,' young Jay faces a problem when his beloved robot companion Nailer runs low on battery and can't find his charging cable. Jay must use his problem-solving skills to help his friend. They retrace their steps and find not only the missing cable but also rediscover some of their favorite shared moments. With Nailer recharged, the story ends on a high note, but little do they know that a new adventure is just around the corner, sparking curiosity about what might happen on their next play day..."
}

image_prompts.prompt_img_00: Create a whimsical cartoonish book cover featuring a seven-year-old boy named Jay with medium skin tone, medium-long black hair wearing blue overalls with a red t-shirt underneath. Alongside him is his companion, a male robot named Nailer with a shiny silver exterior, round head, two antenna-like protrusions, and glowing eyes. The background depicts a colorful fantasy landscape hinting at adventure.
image_prompts.prompt_img_01: Illustrate a cartoonish and whimsical scene where seven-year-old Jay with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, wearing blue overalls and a red t-shirt, is happily discovering a silver robot named Nailer in his backyard. The robot has a round head, two antennas, and glowing eyes. The yard is filled with various toys and a treehouse in the background.
image_prompts.prompt_img_02: Depict a cute cartoon scene where Jay, a seven-year-old boy with medium-long black hair and medium skin tone, is wearing blue overalls with a red shirt, teaching his robot companion, Nailer—a shiny metallic robot with glowing eyes—how to play catch in a sunlit park with green grass and trees.
image_prompts.prompt_img_03: Show a heartwarming cartoonish scene of seven-year-old Jay with medium skin tone and black hair, playing video games in his living room with his metallic companion, Nailer, who has glowing eyes. The room has a cozy feel with a sofa, a rug, and game posters on the walls.
image_prompts.prompt_img_04: Create a whimsical cartoon-style image of seven-year-old Jay with medium skin and black hair, dressed in blue overalls and a red shirt, reading a book to Nailer, his shiny robot companion, under a big tree with colorful leaves in a beautiful park.
image_prompts.prompt_img_05: Illustrate a cartoon scene where Jay, the seven-year-old with medium skin tone and black hair, dressed in blue overalls and a red t-shirt, is showing his silver robot friend Nailer, with glowing eyes, how to cook pancakes in a bright, cheerful kitchen.
image_prompts.prompt_img_06: Draw a cute and cartoonish scenario where Jay, with medium skin and medium-long black hair, is hiding during a game of hide-and-seek with his robot Nailer who is searching with his shiny antennas in an inviting playground with colorful equipment.
image_prompts.prompt_img_07: Create a whimsical cartoon-style image of Jay, a seven-year-old boy, and his robot Nailer, with glowing eyes, working together to build a castle out of blocks in a playroom filled with toys and a rainbow-colored rug.
image_prompts.prompt_img_08: Depict a cartoonish and friendly scene where Jay, a seven-year-old with medium skin tone and dressed in blue overalls and a red t-shirt, and his robot Nailer, are laughing joyfully while riding a merry-go-round in a lively amusement park.
image_prompts.prompt_img_09: Illustrate a whimsical cartoon page where seven-year-old Jay with medium skin tone and black hair, alongside his shiny robot Nailer, are attentively learning at a colorful school desk with school supplies scattered around in a vibrant classroom.
image_prompts.prompt_img_10: Show a delightful cartoonish depiction of Jay, the seven-year-old with medium skin tone, wearing his blue overalls and red shirt, watching shooting stars at night with his robot Nailer who has glowing eyes, sitting on a grassy hill with a cozy blanket.
image_prompts.prompt_img_11: Craft a heartwarming cartoon-style image of Jay, a seven-year-old boy with medium skin tone and black hair, sleeping soundly in his bed while his robot companion Nailer, with glowing eyes, stands as a loyal guardian in the moonlit bedroom.
